title: RECURRING FEMALE LoL PLAYERS FOR ~Miss~ CLUB
body:
I am wanting to start a all Females club on LoL! So i'm looking for all you female players who want to be in a club called ~Miss~.
Have just started this so looikng for players to join! Add me or comment your username! Look foward to meeting all you fellow female players!

replies.body: For wanting to make female friends?

> [{quoted}](name=MystixWuun,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=wOpJxWi6,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-05-16T02:10:04.814+0000)
>
> Still looking!

Are you still looking? :)
why do you have to bring gender into gaming.
I don't see how it's such a problem, I'm wanting to make female gaming friends. Whats so wrong with that.
i dunno, personally i don't ever notice a difference between dudes and chicks on games, unless they make it their mission to let everyone know for some reason, so... why?

As i agree that for the most part there is no difference between males and females in games. There is this lovely thing that certain males on games have called a "f*ckhead gene".

This gene leads them to believe that they can flirt and make inappropriate sexual comments towards females who really just want to have a good time online. 

I can't say for sure why she is aiming for a female only group, but due to the existence of the "f*ckhead gene" i can understand the appeal.
I mean generally speaking males and females act quite differently in speech and on games so it's nice to be able to play with some people you can relate to more.

Feel like this post is gonna get trolled so mu-- woop it already has.
Nice idea through!
I mean, males can join too. But don't see why they would want to join ~Miss~
You realise gender makes barely any difference on the internet, I could say I'm a female and join the club and you wouldn't even realise I'm just tricking everyone.
Don't get baited by them, they're probably trolls
Hahah thanks. All i wanna do is have some female gaming friends! haha
